S.FORM: tinmentung, tinmentong nilacul u siwkay nu nipaluma maazih i cay katakalaway a enal, i tukus maazih tu. u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam timentung,timentong u sulit nu Lipun u sulit nu Amilika saungay misapayu' a cidekay namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Hulam talakaway a nipaluma nalunasulitan a sulu pulungamin a sulu . Hulam kagak a yuan adidiay a mauzipay migankiway a suo . [2009 02 24]. Yuancumincu weiyuanhuy sapayu' a nipaluma nu Yuancumin 2009 p47
